snippet.title: The Man, the Alien, and the AI OFFICIAL TRAILER
snippet.description:
(GAME IS ARCHIVED AND UNAVAILABLE)

First game I've made since getting back on the job force, first dating sim I've made with three characters instead of just one, first game I've made for two game jams at one...all sorts of firsts with this title!

DOWNLOAD ON ITCH.IO: https://sciaenops.itch.io/the-man-the-alien-and-the-ai

ORIGINAL DESCRIPTION:
"This is the story of a young woman who comes across an extraterrestrial AI. The AI's entire function is to slowly rewrite the mind of whoever it has bonded to. The only ones who could separate them are on a distant planet called Valley 7. Now this woman must get to Valley 7 and separate the AI from her mind. But the AI seems to have become quite intrigued with her. And there's that dashing alien rogue hunting her down. And their childhood friend who keeps following her everywhere. What a mess she's gotten herself in to!

    • A strange sci-fi dating sim
    • Choose between your childhood friend, a dashing alien rogue, or the AI in your head!
    • Human lady on whatever-guy-you-choose action!
    • "Action" not meaning anything beyond suggestive dialogue and possibly a massage, that is.
    • Featuring photography from Unsplash.com, sound effects by Zapsplat.com, sprites by Charactercreator.org, and music by Alexander Nakarada"
